name: bonnaroo-2011-eminem-arcade-fire-widespread-panic-the-black-keys-will-take-the-stage
title: Bonnaroo 2011: Eminem, Arcade Fire, Widespread Panic, The Black Keys Will Take The Stage
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
The Bonnaroo 2011 lineup has been announced in a much less annoying fashion than last year (and 15 minutes early to boot!), and this year’s tickets go back on sale Saturday, February 19 at 11am CST. So what’s the verdict? Will you ‘Roo this year? Full lineup below the cut.

  • Eminem
  • Arcade Fire
  • Widespread Panic
  • The Black Keys
  • Buffalo Springfield feat Richie Furay, Stephen Stills, Neil Young, Rick Rosas, Joe Vitale
